item.title: 1222 MFC
item.description: score:1222 Chances: Manulife Investment Management has announced new leadership appointments on its real estate investment team, which could lead to a stronger global real estate investment strategy and portfolio growth. Investing in dividend-paying stocks like Manulife Financial may provide steady returns amid market volatility.
